titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4719) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend and expand the charitable deduction for contributions for food inventory.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-522, by Mr. Burgess.

The rule provides that the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 113-51 shall be considered as adopted and the bill, as amended, shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 120.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 670.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 670.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 186 (Roll no. 428).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 183 (Roll no. 429).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/15/2014--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4719) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend and expand the charitable deduction for contributions for food inventory.
